title: How to Activate an FM Chip on Android

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store app.
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store app. It's the app that has an icon of a colorful 'Play' triangle.

steps.title: Type NextRadio in the search bar.
steps.content: Type NextRadio in the search bar. The search bar the top of the Google Play Store. When you type something in the search bar, a list of matching apps displays below the search bar.

steps.title: Tap NextRadio Free Live FM Radio.
steps.content: Tap NextRadio Free Live FM Radio . It's the app that has an icon that resembles a blue radio. This displays the NextRadio info page.

steps.title: Tap Install.
steps.content: Tap Install . It's the green button below the banner at the top of the info page. This installs the app.

steps.title: Open NextRadio.
steps.content: Open NextRadio. You can open NextRadio by tapping "Open" in the Google Play Store, or you can tap the icon with a blue radio on your home screen or Apps drawer. If your Android device is capable of receiving an FM radio signal, a message displays that says "Lucky You! Your device is FM enabled so you can enjoy live, local FM radio".

steps.title: Plug in a pair of wired headphones and swipe left.
steps.content: Plug in a pair of wired headphones and swipe left. The wire in the headphones acts as antenna. When you have a pair of wired headphones connected, swipe left on the screen to display the next slide. Wireless and BlueTooth headphones are not capable of acting as a radio antenna.

steps.title: Tap I'm Ready!.
steps.content: Tap I'm Ready! . It's the white button at the bottom of the screen. NextRadio will search for local radio stations. If a pop-up displays asking you to allow NextRadio to access this device's location, tap Allow .

steps.title: Tap Local FM Radio or Local Streams.
steps.content: Tap Local FM Radio or Local Streams . These options are below the banner at the top of the screen. This displays local radio stations.

steps.title: Tap a radio station.
steps.content: Tap a radio station. When you find a radio station you want to listen to, tap it to start playing the radio station through your headphones. It may take a moment for the radio station to load. If you don't want to listen to the radio station through your headphones, tap the button with three vertical dots ( â‹® ) in the upper-right corner. Then tap Output to Speaker to listen to the radio on your device's speaker.
